description.full: You want to have the right equipment when the Covenant invasion begins, don't you? If so, check out the latest Avatar gear from the universe of Halo, including clothing featuring the most iconic Halo images and a brand new collection of coveted Spartan armor in all the most popular multiplayer colors!
